channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Junk bonds are now in high demand as Wall Street bets on another Trump presidency
item.description: “US high yield is the trade. It is more domestic-focused and exposed to US economic activity.”

item.title: Microsoft says about 8.5 million of its devices affected by CrowdStrike-related outage
item.description: The global tech outage "affected 8.5 million Windows devices, or less than one percent of all Windows machines," Microsoft said in a blog post on Saturday.

item.title: Is this American Express card worth the $695 fee? Yes — if you’re in this group.
The worst IT catastrophe ever hit less than 1% of all Microsoft Windows devices
item.description: A faulty software update from cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike affected 8.5 million devices globally that rely on the Microsoft Windows operating system.

item.title: 'Ready to step up': VP Harris gains Capitol Hill cheerleaders as Biden isolates with Covid
item.description: President Biden has faced growing pressure from Democrats to drop out of the race after his June debate flop against Donald Trump.

item.title: Activist investor Elliott has built a big stake in Starbucks, WSJ reports
Phishing attempts rise as scam artists try to exploit the CrowdStrike global tech outage
item.description: “We know that adversaries and bad actors will try to exploit events like this,” CrowdStrike CEO George Kurtz said.

item.title: 'Just buying, buying, buying’: What the recent small-cap boom suggests about risk
item.description: The money flow into small caps may not be a rotation from winning growth trades.

item.title: How to get refunds for delayed or cancelled flights after the CrowdStrike outage
Gunman in Trump assassination attempt flew a drone over the rally site ahead of shooting, official says
item.description: More details about the investigation are expected to be made public in the coming week when FBI Director Chris Wray appears before the House Judiciary Committee.

item.title: CrowdStrike update that caused global outage likely skipped checks, experts say
item.description: CrowdStrike's routine update of its widely used cybersecurity software caused clients' computer systems to crash globally on Friday.

item.title: A Trump presidency could ‘rock’ the EV market — and bring Tesla prices way down
‘Black Swan’ investor warns the ‘greatest bubble in human history’ is about to pop and stocks could lose more than half their value
item.description: The federal government will have less capacity to respond, and the economy could enter a recession by the end of this year, Mark Spitznagel predicted.

item.title: Activist Starboard took a stake in Match. Here are steps the investor may take to help lift shares
item.description: Starboard Value's plan to boost shareholder value at Match is thoughtful and complex.

item.title: Robinhood lost $2 million to scam artists with names like ‘Ghost’ and ‘Payday'
